channel.title: How-To on Chris Wang Personal Showcase
channel.description: Recent content in How-To on Chris Wang Personal Showcase

item.title: Algorithm Insertion Sort
item.description: Summary: Introduction and implementation of Insertion Sort in C++ and Python coding languages.

item.title: Algorithm Quick Sort
item.description: Summary: Overview of Quick Sort algorithm with complexity analysis in C++ and Python.

item.title: Algorithm Selection Sort
item.description: Summary: Introduction to Selection Sort algorithm in C++ and Python, demonstrating sorting logic.

item.title: Binary Search Tree
item.description: Learn about Binary Search Trees in Python through visuals and practice traversal methods and search algorithms.

item.title: C++ Reviews
item.description: Summary: Review of C++ covering basics, operators, math functions, string functions, and passing arguments.

item.title: Data Structures and Algorithm
item.description: Summary: Exploring algorithms, complexity analysis, recursion, time complexity, and data structure classification.

item.title: Django Basics
item.description: Tutorial on Django basics, covering app creation, views module, URLs, models, ORM, and more.

item.title: Flink & Elasticsearch Stream
item.description: Streamline Nginx log data processing with Flink for real-time computation and visualization using Elasticsearch.

item.title: Flume & Kafka Stream
item.description: Flume collects nginx logs into Kafka, managing servers efficiently with Flume and Kafka stream.

item.title: Git & GitHub Basics
item.description: Summary: Git and GitHub basics including setup, common commands, and GitHub setup procedures.

item.title: Hadoop3 x Basics
item.description: Learn Hadoop3.x basics on CentOS for big data processing, including setup and configurations.

item.title: Kafka3 x Basics
item.description: Guide to installing and configuring Kafka on CentOS with basic Zookeeper operations.

item.title: LeetCode 1 Two Sum
item.description: Efficiently solve Two Sum problem using hashmap in Python and C++.

item.title: LeetCode 121 Best Time to Buy and Sell Stock
item.description: Maximize profit by buying low and selling high in one transaction.

item.title: LeetCode 217 Contains Duplicate
item.description: LeetCode 217 - Determine if an array contains duplicate numbers using hash set.

item.title: LeetCode 238 Product of Array Except Self
item.description: Compute products of array elements excluding each element efficiently in linear time.

item.title: LeetCode 2400 Number of Ways to Reach a Position A
item.description: LeetCode 2400 calculates ways to reach a position in k steps using combinations.

item.title: Linux Ubuntu Commands
item.description: Summary: Linux Ubuntu commands for changing file permissions and extracting different archives efficiently.

item.title: Nginx Access log Generator
item.description: Generate high traffic Nginx access logs through proxy and header manipulation with Python.

item.title: React & Django Configuration
item.description: Configuring React & Django connection with essential steps and framework installation for both.
